category: Public Architectural Review Committee Regulations/Article 8 (Dismissal of members)
contents: Article 8 (Dismissal of a member) The chairman may dismiss a member if he or she falls under any of the following. 1. When there is a case of misconduct related to duties 2. When it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to neglect of duty, loss of dignity, illness, or other reasons 3. When a member submits a letter of resignation 4. Article 12 (2) 5. If the obligations under each subparagraph of Article 13 are not complied with.
